'''Dr. Gettleman''' is Ross and Monica's pediatrician. But, he is also still Ross' doctor, as revealed in the [[season 9]] episode [[The One With The Pediatrician]], where he also accepts [[Emma]] as a new patient.

[[File:Ross_lollipop.jpeg|thumb|left|250px|"He IS alive!"]]
